<S>2532</S> After<S>3326</S> these things<S>5023</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> walked<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>: for<S>1063</S> he would<S>2309</S> not<S>3756</S> walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> Jewry<S>2449</S>, because<S>3754</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> sought<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S> him<S>846</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the Jews'<S>2453</S> feast<S>1859</S> of tabernacles<S>4634</S> was<S>2258</S> at hand<S>1451</S>.
His<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Depart<S>3327</S> hence<S>1782</S>, and<S>2532</S> go<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>, that<S>2443</S> thy<S>4675</S> disciples<S>3101</S> also<S>2532</S> may see<S>2334</S> the works<S>2041</S> that<S>3739</S> thou<S>4675</S> doest<S>4160</S>.
For<S>1063</S> there is no man<S>3762</S> that doeth<S>4160</S> any thing<S>5100</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>, and<S>2532</S> he himself<S>846</S> seeketh<S>2212</S> to be<S>1511</S> known openly<S>1722</S> <S>3954</S>. If<S>1487</S> thou do<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>, shew<S>5319</S> thyself<S>4572</S> to the world<S>2889</S>.
For<S>1063</S> neither<S>3761</S> did<S>4100</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> believe<S>4100</S> in<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, My<S>1699</S> time<S>2540</S> is<S>3918</S> not yet<S>3768</S> come<S>3918</S>: but<S>1161</S> your<S>5212</S> time<S>2540</S> is<S>2076</S> alway<S>3842</S> ready<S>2092</S>.
The world<S>2889</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> hate<S>3404</S> you<S>5209</S>; but<S>1161</S> me<S>1691</S> it hateth<S>3404</S>, because<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> testify<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> it<S>846</S>, that<S>3754</S> the works<S>2041</S> thereof<S>846</S> are<S>2076</S> evil<S>4190</S>.
Go<S>305</S> ye<S>5210</S> up<S>305</S> unto<S>1519</S> this<S>5026</S> feast<S>1859</S>: I<S>1473</S> go<S>305</S> not<S>3768</S> up<S>305</S> yet<S>3768</S> unto<S>1519</S> this<S>5026</S> feast<S>1859</S>; for<S>3754</S> my<S>1699</S> time<S>2540</S> is<S>4137</S> not yet<S>3768</S> full come<S>4137</S>.
When<S>1161</S> he had said<S>2036</S> these words<S>5023</S> unto them<S>846</S>, he abode<S>3306</S> still in<S>1722</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> his<S>846</S> brethren<S>80</S> were gone up<S>305</S>, then<S>5119</S> went<S>305</S> he<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> up<S>305</S> unto<S>1519</S> the feast<S>1859</S>, not<S>3756</S> openly<S>5320</S>, but<S>235</S> as it were<S>5613</S> in<S>1722</S> secret<S>2927</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> sought<S>2212</S> him<S>846</S> at<S>1722</S> the feast<S>1859</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S>, Where<S>4226</S> is<S>2076</S> he<S>1565</S>?
And<S>2532</S> there was<S>2258</S> much<S>4183</S> murmuring<S>1112</S> among<S>1722</S> the people<S>3793</S> concerning<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>: for some<S>3303</S> said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> He is<S>2076</S> a good man<S>18</S>: others<S>1161</S> <S>243</S> said<S>3004</S>, Nay<S>3756</S>; but<S>235</S> he deceiveth<S>4105</S> the people<S>3793</S>.
Howbeit<S>3305</S> no man<S>3762</S> spake<S>2980</S> openly<S>3954</S> of<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S> for<S>1223</S> fear<S>5401</S> of the Jews<S>2453</S>.
Now<S>2235</S> about<S>1161</S> the midst of<S>3322</S> the feast<S>1859</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went up<S>305</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> taught<S>1321</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> marvelled<S>2296</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, How<S>4459</S> knoweth<S>1492</S> this man<S>3778</S> letters<S>1121</S>, having<S>3129</S> never<S>3361</S> learned<S>3129</S>? <sup>letters: or, learning</sup>
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, My<S>1699</S> doctrine<S>1322</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> mine<S>1699</S>, but<S>235</S> his that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
If<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> will<S>2309</S> do<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> will<S>2307</S>, he shall know<S>1097</S> of<S>4012</S> the doctrine<S>1322</S>, whether<S>4220</S> it be<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>, or<S>2228</S> whether I<S>1473</S> speak<S>2980</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>.
He that speaketh<S>2980</S> of<S>575</S> himself<S>1438</S> seeketh<S>2212</S> his own<S>2398</S> glory<S>1391</S>: but<S>1161</S> he that seeketh<S>2212</S> his glory<S>1391</S> that sent<S>3992</S> him<S>846</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>, and<S>2532</S> no<S>3756</S> unrighteousness<S>93</S> is<S>2076</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
Did<S>1325</S> not<S>3756</S> Moses<S>3475</S> give<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> the law<S>3551</S>, and<S>2532</S> yet none<S>3762</S> of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S> keepeth<S>4160</S> the law<S>3551</S>? Why<S>5101</S> go ye about<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S> me<S>3165</S>?
The people<S>3793</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Thou hast<S>2192</S> a devil<S>1140</S>: who<S>5101</S> goeth about<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S> thee<S>4571</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I have done<S>4160</S> one<S>1520</S> work<S>2041</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>2296</S> all<S>3956</S> marvel<S>2296</S>.
Moses<S>3475</S> therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> gave<S>1325</S> unto you<S>5213</S> circumcision<S>4061</S>; (not<S>3756</S> because<S>3754</S> it is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> Moses<S>3475</S>, but<S>235</S> of<S>1537</S> the fathers<S>3962</S>;) and<S>2532</S> ye<S>4059</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S> circumcise<S>4059</S> a man<S>444</S>.
If<S>1487</S> a man<S>444</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S> receive<S>2983</S> circumcision<S>4061</S>, that<S>3363</S> the law<S>3551</S> of Moses<S>3475</S> should<S>3089</S> not<S>3363</S> be broken<S>3089</S>; are ye angry<S>5520</S> at me<S>1698</S>, because<S>3754</S> I have made<S>4160</S> a man<S>444</S> every whit<S>3650</S> whole<S>5199</S> on<S>1722</S> the sabbath day<S>4521</S>? <sup>that: or, without breaking the law of Moses</sup>
Judge<S>2919</S> not<S>3361</S> according to<S>2596</S> the appearance<S>3799</S>, but<S>235</S> judge<S>2919</S> righteous<S>1342</S> judgment<S>2920</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> some<S>5100</S> of<S>1537</S> them of Jerusalem<S>2415</S>, Is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> this<S>3778</S> he, whom<S>3739</S> they seek<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S>?
But<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2396</S>, he speaketh<S>2980</S> boldly<S>3954</S>, and<S>2532</S> they say<S>3004</S> nothing<S>3762</S> unto him<S>846</S>. Do<S>1097</S> the rulers<S>758</S> know<S>1097</S> indeed<S>3379</S> <S>230</S> that<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the very<S>230</S> Christ<S>5547</S>?
Howbeit<S>235</S> we know<S>1492</S> this man<S>5126</S> whence<S>4159</S> he is<S>2076</S>: but<S>1161</S> when<S>3752</S> Christ<S>5547</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, no man<S>3762</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> whence<S>4159</S> he is<S>2076</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> cried<S>2896</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S> as he taught<S>1321</S>,<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>, Ye both<S>2504</S> know me<S>1492</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye know<S>1492</S> whence<S>4159</S> I am<S>1510</S>: and<S>2532</S> I am<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S> come<S>2064</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>, but<S>235</S> he that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>228</S>, whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S>.
But<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> know<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> I am<S>1510</S> from<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>, and he<S>2548</S> hath sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> they sought<S>2212</S> to take<S>4084</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> laid<S>1911</S> hands<S>5495</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> was<S>2064</S> not yet<S>3768</S> come<S>2064</S>.
And<S>1161</S> many<S>4183</S> of<S>1537</S> the people<S>3793</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> When<S>3752</S> Christ<S>5547</S> cometh<S>2064</S>, will he do<S>3385</S> <S>4160</S> more<S>4119</S> miracles<S>4592</S> than these<S>5130</S> which<S>3739</S> this<S>3778</S> man hath done<S>4160</S>?
The Pharisees<S>5330</S> heard<S>191</S> that the people<S>3793</S> murmured<S>1111</S> such things<S>5023</S> concerning<S>4012</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> and<S>2532</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> sent<S>649</S> officers<S>5257</S> to<S>2443</S> take<S>4084</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Yet<S>2089</S> a little<S>3398</S> while<S>5550</S> am I<S>1510</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S>, and<S>2532</S> then I go<S>5217</S> unto<S>4314</S> him that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
Ye shall seek<S>2212</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> find<S>2147</S> me: and<S>2532</S> where<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S>, thither ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> come<S>2064</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, Whither<S>4226</S> will<S>3195</S> he<S>3778</S> go<S>4198</S>, that<S>3754</S> we<S>2249</S> shall<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> find<S>2147</S> him<S>846</S>? will<S>3361</S> <S>3195</S> he go<S>4198</S> unto<S>1519</S> the dispersed<S>1290</S> among the Gentiles<S>1672</S>, and<S>2532</S> teach<S>1321</S> the Gentiles<S>1672</S>? <sup>Gentiles: or, Greeks</sup>
What<S>5101</S> manner of saying<S>3056</S> is<S>2076</S> this<S>3778</S> that<S>3739</S> he said<S>2036</S>, Ye shall seek<S>2212</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> find<S>2147</S> me: and<S>2532</S> where<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S>, thither ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> come<S>2064</S>?
<S>1161</S> In<S>1722</S> the last<S>2078</S> day<S>2250</S>, that great<S>3173</S> day of the feast<S>1859</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> stood<S>2476</S> and<S>2532</S> cried<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, If<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> thirst<S>1372</S>, let him come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> drink<S>4095</S>.
He that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>, as<S>2531</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> hath said<S>2036</S>, out of<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> belly<S>2836</S> shall flow<S>4482</S> rivers<S>4215</S> of living<S>2198</S> water<S>5204</S>.
(But<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> spake he<S>2036</S> of<S>4012</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S>, which<S>3739</S> they that believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> should<S>3195</S> receive<S>2983</S>: for<S>1063</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> was<S>2258</S> not yet<S>3768</S> given; because<S>3754</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> was<S>1392</S> not yet<S>3764</S> glorified<S>1392</S>.)
Many<S>4183</S> of<S>1537</S> the people<S>3793</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, when they heard<S>191</S> this saying<S>3056</S>, said<S>3004</S>, Of a truth<S>230</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the Prophet<S>4396</S>.
Others<S>243</S> said<S>3004</S>, This<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>. But<S>1161</S> some<S>243</S> said<S>3004</S>,<S>1063</S> Shall<S>3361</S> Christ<S>5547</S> come<S>2064</S> out of<S>1537</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>?
Hath not<S>3780</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> said<S>2036</S>, That<S>3754</S> Christ<S>5547</S> cometh<S>2064</S> of<S>1537</S> the seed<S>4690</S> of David<S>1138</S>, and<S>2532</S> out of<S>575</S> the town<S>2968</S> of Bethlehem<S>965</S>, where<S>3699</S> David<S>1138</S> was<S>2258</S>?
So<S>3767</S> there was<S>1096</S> a division<S>4978</S> among<S>1722</S> the people<S>3793</S> because<S>1223</S> of him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> would<S>2309</S> have taken<S>4084</S> him<S>846</S>; but<S>235</S> no man<S>3762</S> laid<S>1911</S> hands<S>5495</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> came<S>2064</S> the officers<S>5257</S> to<S>4314</S> the chief priests<S>749</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S>; and<S>2532</S> they<S>1565</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Why<S>1302</S> have ye<S>71</S> not<S>3756</S> brought<S>71</S> him<S>846</S>?
The officers<S>5257</S> answered<S>611</S>, Never<S>3763</S> man<S>444</S> spake<S>3779</S> <S>2980</S> like<S>5613</S> this<S>3778</S> man<S>444</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S>, Are<S>4105</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> deceived<S>4105</S> <S>3361</S>?
Have any<S>3387</S> of<S>1537</S> the rulers<S>758</S> or<S>2228</S> of<S>1537</S> the Pharisees<S>5330</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>?
But<S>235</S> this<S>3778</S> people<S>3793</S> who<S>3588</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> not<S>3361</S> the law<S>3551</S> are<S>1526</S> cursed<S>1944</S>.
Nicodemus<S>3530</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, (he that came<S>2064</S> to Jesus<S>846</S> by<S>4314</S> night<S>3571</S>, being<S>5607</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S>,) <sup>to Jesus: Gr. to him</sup>
Doth<S>2919</S> our<S>2257</S> law<S>3551</S> judge<S>2919</S> <S>3361</S> any man<S>444</S>, before<S>4386</S> <S>3362</S> it hear<S>191</S> <S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> know<S>1097</S> what<S>5101</S> he doeth<S>4160</S>?
They answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Art<S>3361</S> <S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> also<S>2532</S> of<S>1537</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>? Search<S>2045</S>, and<S>2532</S> look<S>1492</S>: for<S>3754</S> out of<S>1537</S> Galilee<S>1056</S> ariseth<S>1453</S> no<S>3756</S> prophet<S>4396</S>.
And<S>2532</S> every man<S>1538</S> went<S>4198</S> unto<S>1519</S> his own<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
